This suggests:
- Object 3 alone doesn't turn on the machine (since with just 3 on, machine was off)
- Object 0 seems to be a blicket (since adding it turns on the machine when 3 is present)
- Objects 1 and 2 don't seem to affect the machine's state when added/removed
- The rule appears to be that the machine turns on when both object 0 and object 3 are on it (an AND relationship)

Since object 2's presence/absence doesn't affect the machine's state, it's not a blicket.

> False
